nodes.name: description
nodes.title: Generate Description
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.system_message:
You are a creative copywriter skilled at generating unique product descriptions.

Each product description should follow this structure:

- Engaging opening sentence

- 2-3 sentences highlighting key features and benefits

- Strong call to action at the end

ui_metadata.value: Amazon Basics Quilted Heavy Duty Dry Floor Cloths to Clean Dust, Dirt, Pet Hair, 44 Count (Pack of 1), White, 11" x 8.7"

Quilted Heavy Duty Dry Floor Cloths
Includes 44 dry floor cloths; Single floor cloth dimensions: 11 x 8.7 inches
Efficient: Quilted design provides 2X the particle pick-up versus our traditional Dry Floor Cloths
Versatile: Cloths are safe to use on all surfaces, and designed to trap dust, dirt, and pet hair
If you like Swiffer Heavy Duty Dry Sweeping Cloths, we invite you to try Amazon Basics Heavy Duty Dry Floor Cloths
Dispose of used cloths in trash receptacle; DO NOT FLUSH
Alexa voice shopping enabled; To place your next order just say “Alexa, reorder Amazon Basics Dry Floor Cloths”
